server.objects

Class ConcentrationSite

  • java.lang.Object
    • server.objects.ConcentrationSite

  • public class ConcentrationSite
extends java.lang.Object
    Shared Region with methods used by the Master Thief and the Ordinary Thieves. This class is responsible for gathering thieves and sending them to an Assault Party.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ConcentrationSite(GeneralRepos repos)
      ConcentrationSite constructor No relevant parameters are passed to the constructor but many of the variables are initialized

      • amINeeded

        public boolean amINeeded()
        Checks if the Ordinary Thief that called it is still needed
        Returns:
        true if the thief is still needed, false if the heist is over

      • prepareAssaultParty

        public int prepareAssaultParty()
        Function to be called by the Master Thief to prepare a party
        Returns:
        the party ID or -1 if there are no more rooms available

      • prepareExcursion

        public int[] prepareExcursion()
        Function to be called by the Ordinary Thief enroll in a party
        Returns:
        an array with the party ID and the room ID or null if there are no more rooms available
